dt: someone or something that provides amusement or enjoyment

dt.t: theme parks with their rides, shows, and games are great {it}fun{/it} for the whole family

dt: an attitude or manner not to be taken seriously

dt.t: when I said that playing the piano like that could get you arrested, I only said it in {it}fun{/it}

dt: activity engaged in to amuse oneself

dt.t: came outside to where we were playing touch football and joined the {it}fun{/it}

dt: a state of noisy, confused activity

dt.t: the {it}fun{/it} really began when the deer broke out of its pen and started wandering down the street

shortdef: someone or something that provides amusement or enjoyment
an attitude or manner not to be taken seriously
activity engaged in to amuse oneself

dt.t: there were so many {it}fun{/it} things to do at summer camp that the kids really hated to leave
just a couple of old friends {it}funning{/it} with each other

dt: a situation or state of carefree comfort

dt.t: soon found out that owning and maintaining a yacht wasn't all {it}fun and games{/it}

dt: activity engaged in to amuse oneself

dt.t: it's not all {it}fun and games{/it} at the summer music camp, where students are expected to take their studies seriously

shortdef: a situation or state of carefree comfort
activity engaged in to amuse oneself

dt: to make (someone or something) the object of unkind laughter

dt.t: It's cruel to {it}make fun of{/it} other people's imperfections.

shortdef: to make (someone or something) the object of unkind laughter

dt: to make (someone or something) the object of unkind laughter

dt.t: {it}Poking fun at{/it} the corny romantic comedies they watch is a favorite pleasure of theirs.

shortdef: to make (someone or something) the object of unkind laughter
